title: Ketu Transit in the 11th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting your eleventh house brings detachment from social validation, large networks, and outcome-driven desires. Goals that were once motivating may lose emotional pull, prompting a reassessment of what truly feels meaningful. Associations with groups or friends may thin out naturally, favoring quality over quantity. Gains arrive quietly or feel less satisfying than expected. When embraced consciously, Ketu here refines aspirations, reduces dependency on approval, and aligns long-term hopes with inner truth.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Desires feel less urgent or compelling.
Focus shifts from outcomes to meaning.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Focus moves from profit to sufficiency.

closing: Ketu in the 11th house dissolves attachment to outcomes. When desires quieten, truer aspirations reveal themselves.
